name: Arm-Like
description:
The Mafia has cut off your arm. You're mad. You want revenge. To do this you attach a cybernetic arm to fight back against those who wronged you. The journey through The Mafia's tower will be dangerous...lethal even. You can take it though.

Arm-Like is a mobile Rouge-lite platformer in the vein of The Binding of Issac and Hades. The player must select between one of two cybernetic arms and harness their abilities to fight The Mafia who've wronged you.

This game was created during the 2-week Original Game Round at CMU's NHSGA 2022.

Credits:

Dan Silverstein (Programmer)

Dash Menshik (Artist)

Stephanie Shi (Artist, Producer)

Paulina DePaulo (Sound Designer)

Juniper Mixon (Programmer)

Ray Rentzepis (DILF Mercenary Artist)
